name: Inventory (tibor02)
description:
A fully functional inventory system with ability to pick, drop, move and equip items. Three main screens Inventory, Equip and Attributes. Upon equipping items attributes change dynamically.

Controls:
Arrow keys - Move
Left mouse - Pick up, move, drop and equip items
Right mouse - Equip
Middle mouse - Use (only book is usable)
Space, T - Spawn
I - Inventory
E - Equip
C - Attributes
